description:
The Hultån hatchet packs a lot of power into a small package, whether you need it to prep kindling for your campfire or chop wood for the stove. Holtafors designed the Hultån to a workhorse, striking the right balance between size and usability. The hickory heartwood haft (axe-talk for handle) is comfortable in your hand and provides excellent mechanical advantage. Known for premium materials and classic technique, a Hultafors axe will serve your family for generations.

  • Swedish tool steel head holds its edge and is incredibly tough
  • Head hung using a standard eye-to-haft mount so it's easy to replace the haft (this head will outlast the handle)
  • Heat-treated axe head is softer towards the handle and harder (58-9HRC) along the edge
  • American hickory haft provides a surprising amount of mechanical advantage for its size
  • Linseed oil finish on the hickory haft
  • Leather sheath protects the edge
  • Hultafors axe heads feature a lifetime warranty
  • Hand-finishing means no two are exactly alike
  • Hand-forged in Hults Bruk, Sweden
name: Hultafors Hultan Hatchet
